name: Midtown Taxi
description:
By Shuhan Zhang and Alwyn Zhang

------------------------------------------

You are a taxi driver in Manhattan midtown!

Left-click to take an order.

Right-click to dismiss an order.

You can ONLY take the order that starts from your current location.

You can also click the map to change location, but drive to another location always take time!

Manage your time and earn as much as you can!

GOOK LUCK!
